<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record default">66d954c34769f510bd4e2398c26d431c</macroponent><name>showOnloadAlerts</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api,event,imports}) {
  var paramsString = api.context.props.extraParams,
    paramsObj = paramsString?.split('/'),
    alerts;

  if (!paramsObj || !paramsObj.length || (paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') < 0)) return;

  alerts = paramsObj[paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') + 1];
  try {
    alerts = JSON.parse(alerts);
  } catch(e) {}

  if (!alerts)
    return;
  if (typeof alerts == 'string') {
    alerts = [{
      id: "record-alert-1",
      status: "info",
      icon: "info-circle-outline",
      content: alerts,
      action: {
        type: "dismiss"
      }
    }];
  }
  api.emit('NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS', {
    items: alerts
  });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-02 07:25:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>36d95c474769f510bd4e2398c26d43b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>showOnloadAlerts</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_36d95c474769f510bd4e2398c26d43b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-02 07:25:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
